name: Borrow
description: I need a loan to help me achieve my goals

productLines.name: PersonalLoan
productLines.description: School fees, unexpected bills, a holiday or home renovations? A personal loan can offer you the funds you need

products.name: Personal Loan
products.shortDescription: A personal loan is an easy and affordable way to better your life. Think about the good that a loan can do for you or your family, and you too can experience how a loan can pay you back.
salesHighlights: Loans available from R2 000 to R300 000*
Flexible repayment periods of 6 to 72 months.
Monthly repayments debited from your bank account.
The best possible interest rate that we can offer you.
Easy application process.
If your loan is approved, we will deposit the money directly into your bank account.

When you take out a personal loan, it is compulsory to have loan protection cover for death, disability and retrenchment. Nedbank Personal Loan Protection Insurance has been specially developed to help pay off your outstanding debt should you be unable to make your loan repayments in the event of your death, disablement or retrenchment. Or you can take out an insurance policy of your choice provided it has all the necessary benefits. Ask about our loan insurance when you apply for your loan.

productLines.name: VehicleLoan
productLines.description: Enjoy the mobility and independence your wheels give you.

productLines.name: Home
productLines.description: There's nothing quite like owning your own home.

products.name: Home Loan
products.shortDescription: There's nothing quite like owning your own home. Nedbank's home loan products can help make this happen for you.

requiredDocuments.attributeName: Your financial details - income, expenses, assets and liabilities.
Your Nedbank bond account number - if you're applying for a further loan or readvance.
A copy of your barcoded ID or Smart Card ID - ensure you have a legible, clear copy of both sides of the card.

A signed offer to purchase - this is required only if you are buying a new home. If you are switching your existing bond to Nedbank, or are applying for a further loan or readvance, or are buying an unbonded property, this isn't needed.

productLines.name: StudentLoan
productLines.description: Specifically design for fulltime students and those entering further studies. Surety required

products.name: Student Loan
products.shortDescription: Dreaming of becoming a lawyer, doctor or designer? Whatever your career aspirations are, a Nedbank Student Loan can take you there.
salesHighlights: A great interest rate with flexible repayment options.
If I'm a fulltime student, or still busy with an internship or articles, my guarantor only pays back the interest on my loan.
To only start paying back my loan once my studies are complete.
Optional competitive credit life cover in the case of death or disablement.

productLines.name: Overdraft
productLines.description: Get an overdraft facility linked to your account to manage your monthly cash flow needs.

products.name: Overdraft(1176)
products.shortDescription: An Overdraft is a revolving credit facility linked to a current account that provides access to additional funds. It is short-term borrowing facility that can help you manage unforeseen circumstances and cash flow constraints.
salesHighlights: An Overdraft is linked to the transactional account, and there is no need to open a separate account.
There is no need to transfer available funds between accounts, as the additional funds are linked to the transactional account.
The Overdraft is available whether it is utilised or not.
A fee for the service is charged whether it is utilised or not.
Interest is only charged on the portion of the overdraft utilised.
The limit increases a client's available balance, and there are no restrictions on the type of transactions clients can perform on their Overdraft facility, up to their credit limit.
Clients can either use the full limit granted or a portion thereof.
Competitive interest rates are offered compared to other lending products.
Optional Overdraft Assurance (Credit Life) provide clients with peace of mind in the event of death, disability and retrenchment.

productLines.name: CreditCards
productLines.description: Enjoy access to credit for daily and even larger purchases.

products.name: Nedbank Gold Credit Card (1032)
products.shortDescription: Enjoy the freedom of purchasing the things you need now with the convenience of paying for them over time. Enjoy these and many other benefits with a Nedbank Credit Card.
salesHighlights: Up to 55 days' interest-free credit.
Enjoy zero transaction fees
Free supplementary cards for your spouse or partner
Quick and easy contactless payment functionality
Automatic basic travel insurance cover of up to R2 000 000
For ease and convenience we offer a budget facility for larger than normal purchases which clients can then pay off over 3, 6, 12, 24 or 36 months.
Optional Credit life cover to ensure financial security and peace of mind in the event of death, disability, critical illness or retrenchment.
Option to join the Greenbacks Rewards Programme
Option to join the Nedbank Affinity Programme

Rewards: Nedbank Greenbacks members earn Greenbacks on all eligible spend*. You earn unlimited Greenbacks, twice as fast with the Greenbacks American Express® Credit Card. Greenbacks Rewards is easy to understand and easy to use. You get to choose how you spend your rewards! Clients enjoy the flexibility of having two cards linked to one account - the Greenbacks American Express®™ credit card and the Nedbank MasterCard credit card.

Clients earn accelerated Greenbacks with the Greenbacks American Express® credit card - 2 Greenbacks rewards for every R5 eligible spend and 1 Greenbacks for every R5 eligible spend on the Nedbank MasterCard credit card.

Your rewards are automatically loaded onto a FREE Nedbank Greenbacks SHOP Card which you can use at over 100 000 leading stores nationwide, withdraw as cash from any ATM or use your SHOP CARD internationally. The choice is entirely yours.
Affinities: Through the Nedbank Affinity Programme you can choose to support the development of the arts, the preservation and conservation of the environment, sports development or help orphaned and vulnerable children.
Green Affinity - Helping you support eh environment at no cost to you
Green Affinity - Helping you support eh environment at no cost to you
Children's Affinity - Helping the needy children of South Africa at no cost to you
Sport Affinity - Make sport development happen at no cost to you

products.name: The American Express® Gold Card (1024)
products.shortDescription: American Express - the trusted travel and shopping companion that allows you to explore a world of opportunities with a South African credit card while experiencing the safety and service that come with a globally respected brand.

eligibilityRules.description: Is a South African resident or has a valid work permit;

salesHighlights: The American Express® Gold Card is perfect for everyday shopping and with its budget facility it is perfect for larger than normal purchases.

Enjoy a complimentary Lifestyle Reward when you spend R3 500 or more per month on your American Express® Gold Card. Vouchers can be redeemed at NuMetro, Zando, and Takealot.com or for Airtime across networks.  To qualify for your monthly lifestyle benefit, keep your account in good standing (i.e. the account may not be in arrears or inactive) and spend at least R3 500 on your account per month your account ( cash withdrawals/transfers excluded). To redeem your benefits, visit Lifestyle Rewards (www.amexlifestyle.co.za) and enter your unique code.

Receive either a complimentary appetizer, 20% discount on food bills or a complimentary bottle of wine when paying your American Express Gold Card at participating restaurant. Click here for more info on Taste from American Express (link to: https://www.americanexpress.com/uk/network/dining/)
Exclusive Travel deals such as discounted flights and travel packages brought to you by American Express Travel.
American Express Vacations where you will receive a complimentary dining experience, spa treatment, resort credit offer or complimentary nights.
Travel Insurance: Purchase your travel tickets on your Gold Card and you and your family will receive automatic local and international cover for up to R4 million.
Discounted car rental services and exclusive benefits at Avis and Hertz.
valueAddedServices: You can also pay your balance over time. You can choose how much to pay; just pay in full, the minimum amount due, or anything in between - it's that simple.
A dedicated travel desk to take care of all you travel needs.
Enjoy remarkable basic worldwide protection for you, your partner, your children and your Supplementary Cardmembers which includes up to R10 million cover.
Optional Comprehensive Top Cover is also available on all travel.
Being a Gold Cardmember entitles you to invitations to Amex Experiences events.
Your American Express® Gold Cardmember entitles you to complimentary Supplementary Cards.

As an American Express® Cardmember you w: Bonus MR Points- spend R10 000 within 3 months of opening your account and you will receive 5 000 bonus Membership Rewards points.
Enhanced Car Rental: Complimentary membership to Avis Preferred Plus where you will receive a free additional driver; guaranteed single vehicle upgrade at airport locations and a free weekend voucher

Complimentary Hertz Gold Plus Rewards® membership where you will receive up to 1% discount off standard rates; o one car class upgrade on rentals of five or more consecutive days (subject to availability); and a free additional driver.

Extra value worldwide across various Hotel Programmes including Fine Hotels and Resorts and The Hotel Collection.

Hotel Programmes- Platinum brings you ex: Fine Hotels and Resorts - get access to over 900 hand-selected, iconic five-star properties worldwide.
The Hotel Collection - enjoy credits at more than 400 hotels in over 30 countries, including Hilton, Intercontinental and Mariott Hotels.
The Vacation Collection - when you book two nights or more at most of our hotels, you can also receive a complimentary dining experience, spa treatment, resort credit offer or complimentary nights.
Enjoy complimentary membership to the elite Preferred Golf programme, which boasts over 50 world-renowned golf resorts.
Enhanced Car Rental: Complimentary membership to Avis Preferred Plus where you will receive a free additional driver; guaranteed single vehicle upgrade at airport locations and a free weekend voucher

Complimentary Hertz Gold Plus Rewards® membership where you will receive up to 1% discount off standard rates; o one car class upgrade on rentals of five or more consecutive days (subject to availability); and a free additional driver.
Airport Lounge Access- Complimentary acc: What's more, you can each bring a guest at no cost into all American Express® and Priority Pass™ lounges when you travel.
